channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.0.0)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.0.0)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.0.0 - 2023-06-27 # 1.0.0-beta.5 - 2023-06-26 # If you’re using v0.3.x or older, Please upgrade to v0.4.x before upgrading v1.x.x! もし v0.3.x 以前を使用しているのであれば, v1.x.xに更新する前に v0.4.x に更新してください! Changed # Merged changes in 0.4.12 0.4.12 - 2023-06-22 # Changed # MergePhysBone without ClearEndpointPosition #239 Instead of ClearEndpointPosition, you can use original value, or override Endpoint Position.
